message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $90 right now.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $90 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit from my initial offer. How about $105? It's still a great price for the value you'll get from this product.
Alice, $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's my final offer. If you're not able to accept that, I'll have to move on to another seller.
